name: Crusaders (pablosan995)
description:
In this game you're Roxxy, an Alchemist Magician with a passion for platforming. Use your potion to get to the places you want to go =)


CONTROLS=========================

ENTER | pause menu

MOUSE WHEEL | zoom camera in/out

W,A,S,D | move

SPACE | jump

LMB | shoot

Q | throw Potion

E | heal Magic

F | magic Shield

X | interact

REQUIREMENTS=====================

CPU: i5 3GHZ

GPU:1050 3GB

RAM: 4GB

*side note: please stay tuned for the 1.0 version later this week, with enemies and stuff =)
